statements: SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT medical_condition, claim_status FROM MedicalRecords WHERE claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT record_id, medical_condition, claim_status FROM MedicalRecords WHERE applicant_id = 100;
SELECT record_id, underwriter_notes FROM MedicalRecords WHERE medical_condition = 'Diabetes';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY claim_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT record_id, medical_condition FROM MedicalRecords WHERE applicant_id = 123 ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT applicant_id, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM MedicalRecords GROUP BY applicant_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE medical_condition LIKE '%diabetes%' AND claim_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY record_id LIMIT 10;
SELECT applicant_id, medical_condition FROM MedicalRecords WHERE medical_condition LIKE '%asthma%' OR medical_condition LIKE '%allergy%' ORDER BY applicant_id, medical_condition;
SELECT * FROM underwriting WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, age FROM underwriting WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT applicant_id, name, gender FROM underwriting ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM claims_processing WHERE claim_status = 'Approved'
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims_processing WHERE claim_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM underwriting WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, age FROM underwriting WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT applicant_id, name, age, gender FROM underwriting WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT name, gender FROM underwriting WHERE name LIKE 'J%' AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims_processing WHERE claim_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY claim_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM underwriting;
SELECT applicant_name, age, health_status FROM underwriting ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_type FROM policy_information;
SELECT claimant_name, claim_amount, claim_status FROM claims_processing WHERE claim_amount > 10000;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, start_date, end_date FROM policy_information WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM underwriting;
SELECT applicant_name, age, health_status FROM underwriting WHERE age > 40;
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claimant_name, claim_status FROM claims_processing WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, policy_type FROM policy_information WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT underwriting.applicant_name, policy_information.policy_type FROM underwriting JOIN policy_information ON underwriting.policy_id = policy_information.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM underwriting WHERE applicant_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT policy_type, policy_amount FROM policy WHERE policy_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount FROM claim WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_address FROM underwriting ORDER BY applicant_name DESC;
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount, claim_status FROM claim WHERE claim_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM underwriting WHERE applicant_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, policy_amount FROM policy WHERE policy_amount > 5000 ORDER BY policy_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claim WHERE claim_status = 'Approved' AND claim_amount < 10000;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_address, medical_history FROM underwriting JOIN medical_records ON underwriting.applicant_id = medical_records.applicant_id WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension';

SELECT underwriting.applicant_name, policy.policy_type, claim.claim_date FROM underwriting JOIN policy ON underwriting.applicant_id = policy.policy_holder_id JOIN claim ON policy.policy_id = claim.policy_id WHERE claim_status = 'Rejected';
SELECT * FROM Underwriting;
SELECT applicant_name, gender, occupation FROM Underwriting WHERE age > 30;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment, date_recorded FROM Medical_History ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Policy_Holder WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Underwriting ORDER BY applicant_name DESC, age ASC;

SELECT u.applicant_name, m.diagnosis, c.claim_amount FROM Underwriting u JOIN Medical_History m ON u.id = m.applicant_id JOIN Claims c ON u.id = c.id WHERE c.claim_status = 'approved' ORDER BY c.claim_amount DESC;

SELECT p.policy_number, p.holder_name, c.company_name FROM Policy_Holder p JOIN Insurance_Company c ON p.policy_number = c.policy_number WHERE p.holder_name LIKE 'A%' OR c.company_name LIKE 'I%' ORDER BY p.policy_number ASC;

SELECT u.applicant_name, u.gender, m.date_recorded FROM Underwriting u JOIN Medical_History m ON u.id = m.applicant_id WHERE u.age > 40 AND m.diagnosis = 'Hypertension' ORDER BY u.applicant_name ASC, m.date_recorded DESC;

SELECT c.policy_number, c.claim_amount, p.holder_name, i.company_name FROM Claims c JOIN Policy_Holder p ON c.policy_number = p.policy_number JOIN Insurance_Company i ON p.company_id = i.company_id WHERE c.processing_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY c.claim_amount DESC;
